name: The Good Dinosaur: Dino Crossing
summary: In this endless hopper-style game, players will trek across the world as far as they can, while evading various obstacles like terrifying pterodactyls, raging rivers and more. For some extra help, players can utilize power-ups to slow down time, use shields against obstacles and more. As they progress through the game, they will unlock new characters to play with like Butch, Nash, Ramsey and other daring dinosaurs.
